duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical and commercial support for vacuum pumps and blower products to outside sales team, customers, and distributors.
Act as a subject matter expert for Airtech products, markets, and applications to support commercial team and customers.
Respond to incoming sales inquiries, recommend appropriate products, and promote customized, engineered pneumatic solutions.
Collaborate with engineering to develop new solutions for unique challenges and leverage technology to sell engineered solutions.
Collaborate with outside sales to develop high-potential customer account opportunities, support quoting, and assess non-standard project opportunities.
Track and report on high-value leads and opportunities, highlight new business opportunities, and identify gaps in product coverage.
Periodically attend trade shows and visit customers to stay close to the market.

education_certification.credential: Engineering degree – BSME preferred, experience with rotating equipment or pumps preferred
